meanings.definition: A young child being nursed or cared for.
meanings.sent1: The nursery was filled with happy nurslings playing together.
meanings.sent2: The orphanage took in many nurslings in need of love and care.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous nurslings decided to have a pillow fight in the nursery.
meanings.sent4: The teacher lovingly referred to her students as her nurslings.
meanings.sent5: The image of the giggling nurslings will forever warm my heart.

meanings.definition: A person or animal being nursed or cared for.
meanings.sent1: The injured bird was one of the nurslings at the wildlife rehabilitation center.
meanings.sent2: The elderly woman dedicated her life to caring for abandoned nurslings.
meanings.sent3: The pampered cat acted like a royal nursling demanding treats all day.
meanings.sent4: The wounded soldier was a nursling under the care of the medic.
meanings.sent5: The loyal dog remained by his owner's side like a faithful nursling.
